name: Tim And Rex
description:
You have just robbed the largest bank in town, escape quickly to the boat you have set up at the harbour. The cops are after you, drive fast and get the best escape time possible.

You play as Tim and Rex a pair of robbers and famed drivers each has their own unique driving style and somehow they can swap who is driving almost instantly. You have utilize each of their strengths in order to get the best time!

Check out the DevLog for the game here: https://youtu.be/cZWdAy3zhaQ
